changeSet.author: echiteri
changeSet.comment: Point the dictionary category id from Kenya Lab
changeSet.sql: UPDATE clinlims.dictionary SET dictionary_category_id = (SELECT id FROM clinlims.dictionary_category WHERE description = 'Kenya Lab') WHERE display_key like 'dictionary.result%';

changeSet.author: jfurlong
